column5: Heading out sat. for a final attempt to ice a few more whities and lakers this season....  Any OFC members thinking the same thing?  Hope to see u guys/gals out there
Wish I could...but... I gotta work. You and the big guy ice a few for me. In the mean time, dust off that vex for me and I'll see you in April when the perch are on.  Good luck, Steve
i think we might have to ice a few perch together in the meantime

Where are you heading out from, my best fishing partner(my wife) has a previous commitment tomorrow.  I feel for her but I told her that I would make the sacrifice and fish for the both of us.  Even if I had to go solo.
gonna flip a coin in the morning either out twards fox or out from JP

I'll be out for my last kick at them as well. Not sure where I'm headed, its gonna be a game time decision.  Anyone driving out now that the snow has settled a bit, or is it too wet now? my buddies drove out past the crack on tuesday with no issues......it was just powder then though, might be tougher going now???  Sinker
There is a bit of M&G at jacksons Point fishing first. BBQ near shore one P.M ish. See you there. http://www.lakesimcoemessageboard.com/inde...;id_dbase=83168
